name: Your Harvest Story
description:
Your Harvest Story | Ludum Dare 52

Find out what the seasons have in store for you this year.

In Your Harvest Story, your draw random cards every season which predict how well they will go. At the end you discover how well your next Harvest may go overall.

Game created by Andreia for Ludum Dare 52 with the theme "Harvest".  All assets created by me unless listed in the Credits below.

Credits

Sound Design & Programming: Colombo

Intro Music: Alex McCulloch

Game Music: Tausdei

SFX: OpenGameArt.com

Font: Lemonada - Google Fonts (Link)

Card Art: Images used as Card Art Illustrations were generated in DALL-E
